org.pepstock.charba.client.options.elements

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ChartContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.elements.Point

  • public final class Point
extends ChartContainer
    Point elements are used to represent the points in a line chart or a bubble chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    LineChart, BubbleChart

      Builds the object storing the chart instance.

        public void setRadius(int radius)
        Sets the radius of the point shape. If set to 0, the point is not rendered.
        Parameters:
        radius - array of the radius of the point shape.
